languages.text: {n}Девушка неожиданно отводит взгляд. Ее губы трогает улыбка.{/n} "Когда ты спросил{mf||а} меня, хочу ли я взглянуть на ритуалы твоего мира... Я не была откровенна. Да, увидеть мир Домин — бесценный дар, но... По настоящему я желала сделать это рядом с тобой". {n}Она прищуривается, испытующе глядя на вас.{/n} "Что думаешь ты об этом, Домин'{name}? Твой клинок подвел тебя?"

{n}She suddenly looks away. A smile touches her lips.{/n} "When you asked me if I wanted to look at the rituals of your world... I was not entirely candid with my answer. Yes, to see the Domin's world is a priceless gift, but... what I truly wished for was to see it with you." {n}She gives you a searching look, narrowing her eyes.{/n} "What do you think, Domin'{name}? Has your blade failed you?"

Да, увидеть мир Домин — бесценный дар, но... По настоящему я желала сделать это рядом с тобой". {n}Она прищуривается, испытующе глядя на вас.{/n} "Что думаешь ты об этом, Домин'{name}? Твой клинок подвел тебя?"

languages.text: {n}Aparta la mirada al instante. Esboza una sonrisa.{/n} «Cuando me preguntó si quería ver los rituales de su mundo... no fui del todo sincera con mi respuesta. Sí, ver el mundo de{mf|l| la} Domin es un regalo de valor incalculable, pero... lo que realmente deseaba era verlo con usted». {n}Te observa fijamente, inquisitiva, entrecerrando los ojos.{/n} «¿Qué opina, Domin'{name}? ¿Le ha fallado su arma?».
languages.original_text: {n}She suddenly looks away. A smile touches her lips.{/n} "When you asked me if I wanted to look at the rituals of your world... I was not entirely candid with my answer. Yes, to see the Domin's world is a priceless gift, but... what I truly wished for was to see it with you." {n}She gives you a searching look, narrowing her eyes.{/n} "What do you think, Domin'{name}? Has your blade failed you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Aparta la mirada al instante. Esboza una sonrisa.{/n} «Cuando me preguntó si quería ver los rituales de su mundo... no fui del todo sincera con mi respuesta. Sí, ver el mundo de{mf|l| la} Domin es un regalo de valor incalculable, pero... lo que realmente deseaba era verlo con usted». {n}Te observa fijamente, inquisitiva, entrecerrando los ojos.{/n} «¿Qué opina, Domin'{name}? ¿Le ha fallado su arma?».

languages.text: {n}彼女は不意に視線を逸らす。その唇に笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「あなたの世界の儀式を見たいかと聞いてきたとき…私は心から正直に答えたわけではなかったわ。ええ、ドミンの世界を見られるのはかけがえのない贈り物だけれど…本当にしたかったのは、それをあなたと一緒に見ることだった」{n}彼女は眼をすがめ、あなたを探るように見る。{/n}「あなたはどう思うの、ドミン・{name}？あなたの刃は失敗した？」
languages.original_text: {n}She suddenly looks away. A smile touches her lips.{/n} "When you asked me if I wanted to look at the rituals of your world... I was not entirely candid with my answer. Yes, to see the Domin's world is a priceless gift, but... what I truly wished for was to see it with you." {n}She gives you a searching look, narrowing her eyes.{/n} "What do you think, Domin'{name}? Has your blade failed you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は不意に視線を逸らす。その唇に笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「あなたの世界の儀式を見たいかと聞いてきたとき…私は心から正直に答えたわけではなかったわ。ええ、エニムの世界を見られるのはかけがえのない贈り物だけれど…本当にしたかったのは、それをあなたと一緒に見ることだった」{n}彼女は眼をすがめ、あなたを探るように見る。{/n}「あなたはどう思うの、エニム・{name}？あなたの刃は失敗した？」

languages.text: {n}她突然移开了目光，唇上掠过一丝微笑。{/n}“你之前问我，想不想看看你的世界的仪式……我当时的回答并非全然坦率。没错，能观察秘者的世界，这固然是件无价的礼物，但……我真正希望的是，能与你一起看这一切。”{n}她眯起眼睛，探询般地看了你一眼。{/n}“你是怎么想的，秘者{name}？你的利刃有没有辜负你？”
languages.original_text: {n}She suddenly looks away. A smile touches her lips.{/n} "When you asked me if I wanted to look at the rituals of your world... I was not entirely candid with my answer. Yes, to see the Domin's world is a priceless gift, but... what I truly wished for was to see it with you." {n}She gives you a searching look, narrowing her eyes.{/n} "What do you think, Domin'{name}? Has your blade failed you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}她突然移开了目光，唇上掠过一丝微笑。{/n}“你之前问我，想不想看看你的世界的仪式……我当时的回答并非全然坦率。没错，能观察秘者的世界，这固然是件无价的礼物，但……我真正希望的是，能与你一起看这一切。”{n}她眯起眼睛，探询般地看了你一眼。{/n}“你是怎么想的，秘者{name}？你的利刃有没有辜负你？”

languages.text: {n}Sie wendet sich plötzlich ab. Ein Lächeln huscht über ihre Lippen.{/n} "Als Ihr mich gefragt habt, ob ich einen Blick auf die Rituale Eurer Welt werfen möchte ... War ich mit meiner Antwort nicht ganz aufrichtig. Ja, die Welt {mf|des Domin|der Domin} zu sehen, ist ein unbezahlbares Geschenk ... aber ich habe mir gewünscht, sie mit Euch zu sehen." {n}Sie wirft dir einen fragenden Blick und runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Was denkt Ihr, Domin'{name}? Hat Euch Eure Klinge enttäuscht?"
languages.original_text: {n}She suddenly looks away. A smile touches her lips.{/n} "When you asked me if I wanted to look at the rituals of your world... I was not entirely candid with my answer. Yes, to see the Domin's world is a priceless gift, but... what I truly wished for was to see it with you." {n}She gives you a searching look, narrowing her eyes.{/n} "What do you think, Domin'{name}? Has your blade failed you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie wendet sich plötzlich ab. Ein Lächeln huscht über ihre Lippen.{/n} "Als Ihr mich gefragt habt, ob ich einen Blick auf die Rituale Eurer Welt werfen möchte ... War ich mit meiner Antwort nicht ganz aufrichtig. Ja, die Welt {mf|des Domin|der Domin} zu sehen, ist ein unbezahlbares Geschenk ... aber ich habe mir gewünscht, sie mit Euch zu sehen." {n}Sie wirft dir einen fragenden Blick und runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Was denkt Ihr, Domin'{name}? Hat Euch Eure Klinge enttäuscht?"

languages.text: {n}Elle détourne subitement le regard, l'esquisse d'un sourire aux lèvres.{/n} « Quand vous m'avez demandé si je souhaitais assister aux rituels de votre monde... je n'ai pas été tout à fait honnête avec vous. Certes, c'est un privilège inestimable que d'observer votre univers, mais... je voulais surtout le voir avec vous. » {n}Les yeux plissés, elle vous scrute avec attention.{/n} « Eh bien, Domin'{name}, qu'en pensez-vous ? Votre lame vous a-t-elle {mf|déçu|déçue} ? »
languages.original_text: {n}She suddenly looks away. A smile touches her lips.{/n} "When you asked me if I wanted to look at the rituals of your world... I was not entirely candid with my answer. Yes, to see the Domin's world is a priceless gift, but... what I truly wished for was to see it with you." {n}She gives you a searching look, narrowing her eyes.{/n} "What do you think, Domin'{name}? Has your blade failed you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle détourne subitement le regard, l'esquisse d'un sourire aux lèvres.{/n} « Quand vous m'avez demandé si je souhaitais assister aux rituels de votre monde... je n'ai pas été tout à fait honnête avec vous. Certes, c'est un privilège inestimable que d'observer votre univers, mais... je voulais surtout le voir avec vous. » {n}Les yeux plissés, elle vous scrute avec attention.{/n} « Eh bien, Domin'{name}, qu'en pensez-vous ? Votre lame vous a-t-elle {mf|déçu|déçue} ? »

languages.text: {n}Aniden bakışlarını çeviriyor. Dudaklarına bir gülümseme oturuyor.{/n} "Bana dünyanın ayinlerine göz atmak isteyip istemediğimi sorduğunda... Verdiğim cevapta tam olarak samimi değildim. Evet, bir Domin'in dünyasını görmek paha biçilemez bir hediyedir ama... Gerçekten istediğim, onu seninle birlikte görmekti." {n}Gözlerini kısarak sana sorgulayıcı bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Ne düşünüyorsun Domin'{name}? Kılıcın seni hayal kırıklığına mı uğrattı?"
languages.original_text: {n}She suddenly looks away. A smile touches her lips.{/n} "When you asked me if I wanted to look at the rituals of your world... I was not entirely candid with my answer. Yes, to see the Domin's world is a priceless gift, but... what I truly wished for was to see it with you." {n}She gives you a searching look, narrowing her eyes.{/n} "What do you think, Domin'{name}? Has your blade failed you?"
